title: (Senior) Product Marketing Manager (m/f/d)
description:
**We are looking for a**
**(Senior) Product Marketing Manager (m/f/d)**
**(unlimited, full-time) Join our team at our location in Berlin, Amsterdam or Stockholm – flexible working conditions available**
 Step into the limelight as our (Senior) Product Marketing Manager (m/f/d) and orchestrate exceptional product narratives that captivate and inspire. With your entrepreneurial mindset and innovative thinking, you'll be the conductor of our product symphony, ensuring every note resonates with our target audience. Are you ready to make an impact? If you possess a deep passion for marketing, an inherent understanding of fintech and are driven by the prospect of making a tangible impact, then this opportunity may be the perfect fit for you.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities:**
* Drive Measurable Growth & Own Campaign KPIs – Take full accountability for achieving marketing-driven revenue and performance goals. You’ll define clear KPIs, track success across the funnel and optimize campaigns based on data-driven insights to maximize impact on pipeline growth, conversion rates, and ROI.
* Optimize Positioning and Value Proposition – Analyze customer behavior, communication performance and competitor offerings to refine our value proposition in collaboration with product and commercial teams.
* Stay Ahead of Market Trends – Work closely with the product team to monitor industry trends and insights, shaping thought leadership, market education and demand-generation initiatives.
* Collaborate Cross-Functionally – Partner with product, commercial, brand and content teams to align strategies with customer needs, target segments and market opportunities.


**What You Bring:**
* 5+ years of experience in product marketing within SaaS, Finance, Crypto or Deep Tech with a proven track record of driving lead and demand generation.
* Results-driven mindset – Demonstrated success in crafting market communications that resonate with target audiences and improve conversion rates.
* Strategic and hands-on approach – Ability to think big while executing efficiently, ensuring marketing initiatives translate into tangible business impact.
* Project management excellence – Strong ability to juggle multiple projects, prioritize effectively and meet deadlines in a dynamic environment.
* Creative problem-solving skills – Adaptability to evolving market trends and the ability to turn insights into actionable marketing strategies.
* Fluency in English – Our working language is English and strong communication skills are essential.


 #EUR7
   

  

**Benefits:**
* At Riverty, you can be who you are. We are committed to creating an inclusive environment and a culture of appreciation, enriched by our employee networks.
* Prioritize your health with supported sports and leisure activities.
* Take advantage of our numerous training and development opportunities! Enhance your skills with training offered by the Bertelsmann University, language courses, or leadership training.
* Benefit from our discounts on Bertelsmann products and financial incentives.
* With our diverse work models, you can tailor your work to your preferences. Take advantage of mobile office, flexible working hours, and part-time models.

title: Technology Domain Lead: Deal Management, Investor Relations & Value Creation Applications
description:
**Working in partnership to build better businesses.**
 Triton is an investment firm that believes in engaging with boards, managers and employees to build better businesses. We are entrepreneurs who invest capital where we can see an opportunity to create long-term value.
   

  

 We believe Triton is a great place to work and we want our team to be entrepreneurial, enjoy being part of a collective effort, inspire and challenge each other, and to bring an international mindset.
   

  

**About Triton**
*Founded in 1997 and owned by its partners, Triton is a leading European mid-market sector-specialist investor. Triton focuses on investing in businesses that provide mission critical goods and services in its three core sectors of Business Services, Industrial Tech, and Healthcare. Triton has over 150 investment* 
*professionals, operational and functional specialists* 
*across 11 offices and invests through three complementary “All Weather” strategies: Mid-Market Private Equity, Smaller Mid-Cap Private Equity, and Opportunistic Credit.*
**Strategy**
 Triton Is An Operational Investor. Its Platform Consists Of Three Complementary Strategies That Invest In Future Winners Below Their Full Potential In The Business Services, Industrial Tech, And Healthcare Sectors
   

  

* Mid-Market Private Equity: Helping mid-market businesses to unlock their full potential by addressing challenges and accelerating growth.
* Smaller Mid-Cap Private Equity: Building market leaders by applying Triton’s private equity strategy to smaller mid-market companies.
* Credit: Investing in senior-secured debt where we believe markets do not recognise the potential of the underlying business.


 Our global investor base of more than 200 investors includes top tier public & private pensions, SWFs, insurance companies, banks, family offices, asset managers, and endowments. To date, Triton has raised more than €20 billion in capital commitments.
   

  

 Triton businesses employ more than 100,000 employees worldwide. Triton endeavours to be a forward-looking, responsible owner and partner to all stakeholders, including employees, customers, suppliers, management teams, board members and society at large.
   

  

**The Role**
 Triton Partners is looking for an experienced Technology Domain Lead to join our Technology team in Stockholm. The ideal candidate should have a background in Computer Science or Engineering, strong skills in managing stakeholders, and a solid technical foundation. This role is part of the Business Systems team, which also includes Data & Integrations, Financial Applications, and HRIS. Reporting directly to the Head of Business Systems, this position offers the chance to work in a dynamic team focused on digital and technological innovations in the investment sector. Join us in using technology to strengthen our capabilities in deal management, investor relations, and value creation.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Overseeing the development and management of applications used for deals, investor relations, and value creation.
* Collaborating closely with various departments to ensure seamless integration and functionality of CRM and other digital applications.
* Managing product life cycles from strategic planning to tactical activities.
* Interacting regularly with stakeholders to understand and deliver on their needs.
* Coordinating with external firms and vendors to optimize application functionalities and integrations.
* Creating and maintaining roadmaps for the area to align with strategic objectives.


**Essential Requirements**
* Lead the development and management of applications used for deals, investor relations, and value creation
* Collaborating closely with various departments to ensure seamless integration and functionality of CRM and other digital applications
* Managing product life cycles from strategic planning to tactical activities
* Interacting regularly with stakeholders to understand and deliver on their needs
* Coordinating with external firms and vendors to optimise application functionalities and integrations
* Creating and maintaining roadmaps for the area to align with strategic objectives
* Traveling within Europe will be required


**Core Competencies**
* Proven experience delivering value to stakeholders with CRM applications
* Experience of private equity or M&A is mertiable
* Experience implementing agile software methodologies in a SaaS landscape
* Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field
* At least 5 years of experience in a relevant role
* Strong technical skills and understanding
* Excellent stakeholder management and communication skills
* Experience in coordinating with external vendors and firms
* Fluency in English


**Values**
* High Performance / Ambition - Set high standards: Be a self-starter, a self-thinker and hold yourself and others accountable.
* Project Management – Demonstrate accountability by ensuring the impact intended is delivered and measured.
* Intellectual Agility - Develop a growth mindset that considers new approaches, learns from mistakes, and improves continuously
* People First - Have a People First Mindset: Invest in yourself, be proactive in motivating and supporting others, develop productive working habits and build resilience.


**Benefits**
 In addition to your compensation, pension and healthcare cover; Triton offers a wellbeing allowance that entitles you to SEK 10,800 per year that can be claimed for exercise membership or equipment, relaxation training and nutrition consultations.
   

  

 Triton is an equal opportunity employer. We recognise that diversity is key to our continued success, and strive to maintain a fair and equitable recruitment process for all applicants.

title: Regional Sales Representative (RSR), Northern Europe
description:
**Your Title:** 
 Regional Sales Representative (RSR), Northern Europe
   

  

**Job Location:** 
 Sweden - Danderyd or Remote: Sweden, Norway, Finland
   

  

**Division:** 
 Civil Construction Field Solutions CCFS
   

  

*Are you looking to be a part of an award-winning organization and one of the fastest growing technology companies that is transforming the construction landscape with innovative technology solutions?*
*Join our team! We will offer your versatile tasks in a diverse, inspiring and dynamic working environment with great colleagues. Apply as soon as possible! Please, submit your CV/application only in English.*
 In this position you will have a very specific focus on CEC Machine control solutions and Connected Site promotion with a primary focus on Northern Europe. You will be deeply involved in developing solid business relationships with Equipment Dealers.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
 You will provide sales and application support for distributors and potentially end users in the CEC product portfolio You will:
   

  

* Increase market share through the development of Connected Site solutions to existing accounts and new customers. You will also be able to develop customer interest on Trimble Continuum solutions to develop sales on the entire CEC solutions
* Sell through select and perhaps multiple channels of distribution and have large project involvement, and will develop strategic key end-user relationships to ensure the successful sale of all Trimble products and services. You will have a strong field presence across the Nordic region
* Be responsible for ongoing dealer development through the introduction, follow-up and ongoing involvement in Trimble’s channel development programs/workshops.


**Primary Responsibilities**
 You will report to the Nordic Regional Sales Manager. Together with the Regional Sales Manager, you will participate in the development and implementation of regionally assigned sales plans. You will be in interface with distributor management, operations, sales, service and support staff.
   

  

**You Will**
* Develop strong long term business development with regional equipment dealers and implementation of Trimble Technology Outlets
* Conduct on site distributor training and job site demonstrations together with the application engineers
* Be in interface with major regional accounts
* Conduct joint sales presentations with focus on Educational Presentations
* Drive the Annual Review Meetings with key accounts in each dealer territory
* Assist in the identification, procurement and subsequent training of distribution sales and application personnel
* Evaluate marketplace potential for all served markets and customer segments using Data Analytics services as available
* Assist in the development of and participation in, specific technical communications and training requirements such as Trimble Dimensions, Boot Camps, Construction News, and others
* Ensure new product release involvement by all dealers including local strategy, training and proper inventory
* Provide input on competitive products and activities primarily to the CCFS Business Area
* Assist in the identification and development of new distribution.


**What Skills, Experience And Knowledge You Should Bring**
* Proven experience of successful consultative sales
* Experience in Channel development and management
* Business, sales, market and domain knowledge in survey, civil engineering and / or construction
* Ideally experienced in Technology solutions for Construction
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills
* Ability and willingness to travel up to+/- 75%
* Proficient knowledge of civil construction applications
* Product knowledge is a bonus
* Strong collaboration and relationship building skills
* Ability to prioritize, organize and manage multiple projects at one time
* Fluency in English and one Scandinavian language. Additional Nordic language skills are a bonus.


**About Our CCFS Division**
 Trimble's Civil Construction Field Solutions division focuses on providing advanced technology solutions to enhance productivity, accuracy, and efficiency in civil construction projects. This division integrates hardware and software tools to support the entire construction lifecycle, from initial site assessment and planning through to design, construction, and ongoing maintenance.
   

  

 Key offerings include machine control systems, site positioning systems, and software for project management and collaboration. These tools enable precise grading, excavation, paving, and site management, which help contractors and engineers streamline workflows, reduce rework, and improve overall project outcomes. For more information on currently developed products, see https://heavyindustry.trimble.com
   

  

**About Trimble**
 Dedicated to the world’s tomorrow, Trimble is a technology company delivering solutions that enable our customers to work in new ways to measure, build, grow and move goods for a better quality of life. Core technologies in positioning, modeling, connectivity and data analytics connect the digital and physical worlds to improve productivity, quality, safety, transparency and sustainability. From purpose-built products and enterprise lifecycle solutions to industry cloud services, Trimble is transforming critical industries such as construction, geospatial, agriculture and transportation to power an interconnected world of work. For more information about Trimble (NASDAQ: TRMB), visit: https://www.trimble.com/en
   

  

**Trimble’s Inclusiveness Commitment**
 We believe in celebrating our differences. That is why our diversity is our strength. To us, that means actively participating in opportunities to be inclusive. Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion have guided our current success while also moving our desire to improve. We actively seek to add members to our community who represent our customers and the places we live and work.
   

  

 We have programs in place to make sure our people are seen, heard, and welcomed and most importantly that they know they belong, no matter who they are or where they are coming from.
   

  

**Trimble’s Privacy Policy**
 #civilconstruction
   

  

 #fieldsolutions

title: Maps Services Lead Engineer
description:
Are you a self-starter looking for an exciting career opportunity? Do you like to ship software solutions that impact Apple Maps users around the world? Are you passionate about leading complex software engineering work? A job at Apple is unlike any other you’ve had. You’ll be challenged, inspired, and you will be proud of your work. Maps are a significant part of our everyday lives. Whether you are selecting a fine restaurant for dinner with friends, finding public transit that gets you to the big game before kickoff, or looking for the nearest gas station, you are relying on services provided by the Maps Services Team. The Apple Maps Services team develop cutting-edge guidance products to constantly improve the navigation experience and help hundreds of millions of people every day with their driving, walking and public transit needs. The team is also responsible for generating the vector maps that powers the beautiful map display in Apple Maps. We are looking for a skilled lead software engineer, with a passion to take ownership of problems and deliverables, lead software engineering work, and to organise skilled engineers to deliver the next generation of display and navigation services for Apple Maps.
  

  

**Description**  

  

- Lead and drive the work of a team of remarkably skilled software engineers. - Be a strong advocate for the customer experience. - Take ownership of solving problems and deliver solutions on time. -Communicate and coordinate with teams and stakeholders in the US. - Participating in design and code reviews. - Influencing the future product direction.
  

  

**Minimum Qualifications**  

* Ability to take ownership, identify requirements, prioritise and make progress in an environment with limited given input.
* Very strong in leading others, and hands-on, in programming, system design and problem solving.
* Extensive, professional experience from software engineering.
* Fluent communication in English with a sense for listening to others as well as getting your message through in a crisp way.
* Experience in cross team collaboration and communication across multiple timezones.

  

**Preferred Qualifications**  

* Strong understanding of common data structures and basic graph algorithms.
* Mindset of writing efficient code, recognising that the "optimal solution" may not always be the most efficient if its impact is minimal.
* Experience in Scala, Python, Kotlin, and C++.
* Knowledge in Spark, Iceberg and spatial algorithms/problems.
* Experience from working in distributed engineering teams.
* Knowledge from the maps (GIS) domain, related to routing, navigation, traffic or display maps.
Experience from the ML domain.  
*

title: SVT söker backendutvecklare - Python / Rust
description:
**Utveckla AI-lösningar med Python och Rust och bidra till ett mer nyfiket och insatt samhälle – på SVT i Stockholm!**
 Vill du arbeta med teknik som gör skillnad? Som backendutvecklare hos SVT får du utveckla smarta lösningar inom automatiserad textning och AI – ett område där SVT är ledande i Europa. Här kombinerar du teknik, innovation och samhällsnytta, och bidrar samtidigt till ett starkt public service-uppdrag.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig**
* En organisation i teknisk framkant med en offensiv AI-strategi
* Ett arbete inom Public Service där det viktigaste målet är förbättra upplevelsen för våra användare snarare än att främst mätas på att generera intäkter
* Att bli en del av en modern, snabbrörlig och innovativ organisation där vi är ödmjuka och respekterar varandra – våra produkter är ett resultat av våra medarbetares passion!
* En teknisk bredd och frihet i val av lösningar – vi utvecklar allt från idé till leverans.
* En roll med stor flexibilitet och möjligheten att styra över både arbetsmetoder och tekniska val
* Ett samhällsviktigt uppdrag där du bidrar till att alla ska kunna ta del av SVT:s innehåll
* Delta i teamöverskridande hackdagar och innovationssprintar, med fokus på att utveckla och experimentera inom ditt område


**Det här gör du hos oss**
* Utvecklar och underhåller backendlösningar i bl.a Python och/eller Rust.
* Arbetar med nyutveckling och förbättring av befintliga tjänster.
* Bidrar till optimering av arbetsflöden för automatiserad och manuell textning
* Ansvarar för hela kedjan av tjänster för undertextning


**Ditt team och arbetsplats**
 Du blir en del av teamet Undertext – ett tvärfunktionellt team som representeras av alla kompetenser som behövs för att bygga avancerade tjänster och arbetsverktyg för både interna och externa användare. Teamet består idag av mjukvaruutvecklare, tjänstedesigner, AI/ML engineer, Agil coach och produktägare.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder en flexibel arbetsmiljö där du har möjlighet att jobba 50% hemifrån. Vi ses dock gärna på kontoret då vi gillar att träffas på vårt nyrenoverade kontor. Vi strävar också alltid efter att tillgodose dina tekniska behov, till exempel genom att erbjuda dig den laptop som passar dig bäst.
   

  

**Mer om dig**
 Är du en nyfiken, prestigelös och lösningsorienterad person så tror vi att du kommer att trivas hos oss! Du är öppen för att lära dig om nya domäner och vill jobba med text, ljud, bild och video, även om du inte nödvändigtvis har gjort det tidigare.
   

  

 Vi söker dig med erfarenhet inom Python och/eller Rust. Vår tekniska miljö består även av Java, Scala, Go, Azure, Tokio, Dropwizard, Akka, Netty, React, Kafka, RDBMS, NoSQL, Docker, Kubernetes, REST, GraphQL och gRPC. Det är klart positivt om du har intresse eller kunskap av en eller flera av dessa. Vi tror även att du är van att jobba med helheten och har en god förståelse för arkitektur samt van i att jobba med både nyutveckling och äldre system.
   

  

 Vi värdesätter också erfarenhet av arbete i komplexa domäner och en vilja att modernisera och förenkla system.
   

  

 Vi hoppas att du precis som oss motiveras av att jobba med kvalité och att skapa robusta lösningar – vi bygger för användarna!
   

  

**Så här får vi kontakt**
 I den här rekryteringen har vi valt att samarbeta med Ada Digital som strävar efter en transparent, inkluderande och snabbrörlig rekryteringsupplevelse. Vi vill veta mer om dig och din potential! Du söker tjänsten enkelt och behöver inte bifoga några dokument. Det räcker med en motivering till varför du söker tjänsten och om du saknar CV kan du bifoga din LinkedIn-profil. Följ sedan din ansökan live via vår hemsida. Urvalet sker löpande och tjänsten kan bli tillsatt före sista ansökningsdatum. Är du nyfiken och vill veta mer innan du söker? Hör av dig till ansvarig rekryterare. Vi ser fram emot att få kontakt med dig!
